tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SentimentAnalysis (
  analysis_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id INT,
  sentiment_score FLOAT,
  sentiment_label VARCHAR(20),
  FOREIGN KEY (report_id) REFERENCES StockReports(report_id)
);

CREATE TABLE analyst_reports (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_text TEXT,
  report_date TIMESTAMP,
  stock_symbol TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_scores (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  report_id UUID REFERENCES analyst_reports(id),
  overall_sentiment FLOAT,
  positive_sentiment FLOAT,
  negative_sentiment FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_performance (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_symbol TEXT REFERENCES analyst_reports(stock_symbol),
  price FLOAT,
  volume INT,
  performance_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE stock_reports (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  stock_symbol VARCHAR(10),
  report_date DATE,
  analyst_name VARCHAR(50),
  report_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE sentiment_scores (
  report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sentiment_score FLOAT,
  sentiment_category VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE stock_sentiment (
  stock_symbol VARCHAR(10) PRIMARY KEY,
  overall_sentiment VARCHAR(20),
  total_reports_processed INT
)

CREATE TABLE analyst_sentiment (
  analyst_name VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
  average_sentiment_score FLOAT,
  total_reports_analyzed INT
)

CREATE TABLE stock_reports (
 report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
 report_text TEXT,
 report_date TIMESTAMP,
 stock_ticker VARCHAR
)
